longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of Slovakia must be valid for the period of
  intended stay. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of
  Slovakia. 

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Slovakia will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- All minors who are nationals of Slovakia are expected to
  hold their own travel document.
Additional Information:
- Nationals of Slovakia staying in Switzerland for more than 3
  months must apply for a residence permit.
- Geneva airport (GVA) is located by convention in
  Switzerland
